metadata.Description: Energy services provided in settings where people have been displaced due to conflicts, disasters, or other reasons.

level 1.Description: Energy services in displacement settings address the energy access challenges faced by displaced populations, ensuring their basic energy needs are met.
Energy services in displacement settings employ renewable energy technologies to provide clean and sustainable energy solutions.
Energy services in displacement settings collaborate with humanitarian organizations to ensure the provision of reliable and sustainable energy services.
Energy services in displacement settings support the creation of livelihood opportunities through the provision of energy for income-generating activities.
Energy services in displacement settings administer energy assistance programs to ensure access to affordable and reliable energy services.
Energy services in displacement settings measure energy consumption to identify energy-saving opportunities and promote energy efficiency.
Energy services in displacement settings align with climate change mitigation efforts by promoting the use of clean and renewable energy sources.
Energy services in displacement settings are an instance of sustainable energy access, ensuring the provision of reliable and affordable energy services in challenging settings.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

level 2.Subject: Action Opportunities
level 2.Description: Action Opportunities implements energy efficiency measures to reduce energy consumption and promote sustainable energy practices.

level 2.Subject: Action Opportunities
level 2.Description: Action Opportunities focuses on climate change mitigation by promoting sustainable energy solutions and reducing greenhouse gas emissions.

level 3.Subject: energy efficiency
level 3.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.
